sections.title: About you
sections.description: We ask this to help counter money laundering, financing of terrorism, and other crimes.

fields.label: Date of birth
fields.helpText: For example, 21 03 1979

fields.label: Place of birth
fields.helpText: For example, London

fields.label: Email address
fields.helpText: We will only use this to send a confirmation that we have received your application. This will include your submission reference number, which you need to save.

sections.title: What is your passport number?

fields.label: What is your passport number?
fields.helpText: For example, 502135326

sections.title: Your address
Are you entering or leaving the EU?

fields.label: Are you entering or leaving the EU?
fields.errorMessage: Select whether your are entering or leaving the EU

sections.title: When are you entering the EU?

fields.label: When are you entering the EU?
fields.helpText: You can only use this form for entering the EU within the next 3 days.
fields.errorMessage: You cannot enter a date more than 3 days in the future, or a date in the past

sections.title: When are you leaving the EU?

fields.label: When are you leaving the EU?
fields.helpText: You can only use this form for leaving the EU within the next 3 days.
fields.errorMessage: You cannot enter a date more than 3 days in the future, or a date in the past

sections.title: How are you travelling into the EU?

fields.label: How are you travelling into the EU?
fields.errorMessage: Select how you are travelling into the EU
optionHelpText: This is via ferry ports, for example

sections.title: How are you travelling out of the EU?

fields.label: How are you travelling out of the EU?
fields.errorMessage: Select how you are travelling out of the EU
optionHelpText: This is via ferry ports, for example

sections.title: Where will you start your journey?
sections.description: Enter only standard English characters. For example, for Düsseldorf Airport, enter: Dusseldorf Airport. For Côte d’Ivoire, enter: Cote d’Ivoire.

fields.label: Name of airport or port
fields.helpText: For example, London Heathrow

sections.title: Where will you end your journey?
sections.description: Enter only standard English characters. For example, for Düsseldorf Airport, enter: Dusseldorf Airport. For Côte d’Ivoire, enter: Cote d’Ivoire.

fields.label: Name of airport or port
fields.helpText: For example, London Heathrow

sections.title: Will you change at another airport or port?

fields.label: Will you change at another airport or port?
fields.shortName: Change at another airport or port
fields.helpText: If you change to another plane or boat on your way to the EU, select yes. For example, if you are flying into the EU from Australia and change in Singapore.
fields.errorMessage: Select whether you will change at another airport or port

sections.title: How many other airports or ports will you travel via?

fields.label: How many other airports or ports will you travel via?
fields.shortName: Number of other airports or ports changing at
fields.helpText: For example, if you are flying into the EU from Australia and change in Singapore, enter 1.
fields.errorMessage: Select how many other airports or ports you will change at

sections.title: Details of change $n
sections.description: Enter only standard English characters. For example, for Düsseldorf Airport, enter: Dusseldorf Airport. For Côte d’Ivoire, enter: Cote d’Ivoire.

fields.label: Name of airport or port
fields.helpText: For example, Singapore Changi Airport

sections.title: Where will you declare the cash at customs?
sections.description: This is your EU entry or exit point by air or sea.

fields.label: Name of airport or port
fields.helpText: For example, London Heathrow

sections.title: Are you carrying more than 5 different currencies?

fields.label: Are you carrying more than 5 different currencies?
fields.errorMessage: Select whether you are carrying more than 5 different currencies
optionHelpText: On the next 5 pages you need to enter the 5 largest currency amounts, then upload a document detailing all of your currencies.

sections.title: How many currencies are you carrying?

fields.label: How many currencies are you carrying?
fields.helpText: Enter a number between 1 and 5.
fields.errorMessage: Select how many currencies you are carrying

sections.title: Currency $n
sections.description: Enter details about one currency only.

fields.label: Currency name
fields.helpText: For example, euros, US Dollars, British Pounds.

fields.infoText: Enter a total value for each type of this currency. If any of these do not apply, enter 0 as the total value. Do not convert any values into euros.

fields.label: Notes and coins total value
fields.helpText: For example, if you have have 1,000 in notes and 500 in coins, enter: 1,500. If you do not have any of these, enter 0.

fields.label: Cheques and travellers' cheques total value
fields.helpText: If you do not have any of these, enter 0.

fields.label: Bankers' drafts total value
fields.helpText: If you do not have any of these, enter 0.

sections.title: Main currency $n
sections.description: Enter details about one currency only.

fields.label: Currency name
fields.helpText: For example, euros, US Dollars, British Pounds.

fields.infoText: Enter a total value for each type of this currency. If any of these do not apply, enter 0 as the total value. Do not convert any values into euros.

fields.label: Notes and coins total value
fields.helpText: For example, if you have have 1,000 in notes and 500 in coins, enter: 1,500.  If you do not have any of these, enter 0.

fields.label: Cheques and travellers' cheques total value
fields.helpText: If you do not have any of these, enter 0.

fields.label: Bankers' drafts total value
fields.helpText: If you do not have any of these, enter 0.

sections.title: Upload details of all your currencies

fields.infoText:
Upload a document with details of each currency you are carrying, including:
* name of currency
* total notes/coins amount in this currency
* total cheques, including travellers' cheques, amount in this currency
* total bankers' drafts amount in this currency

fields.label: Upload a file
fields.helpText: For example, XLSX, DOCX, or JPEG

sections.title: Do you own the cash?

fields.label: Do you own the cash?
fields.helpText: Select yes if the largest share of the cash belongs to you. It belongs to you if you earned it, were given it to keep as your own, or won it.
fields.errorMessage: Select whether the cash belongs to you

sections.title: Details of main cash owner
sections.description: We ask this to help counter money laundering, financing of terrorism, and other crimes. If there are multiple cash owners, provide details of who owns the largest amount.

sections.title: Provide details of where the cash comes from
sections.description: If the cash is owned by more than one person, select where the main part of your share of the cash comes from.

fields.label: Cash origin
fields.helpText: For example, sale of a property, personal savings or business takings.

fields.label: Country where the cash was generated
fields.helpText: Enter only standard English characters. For example, for Côte d’Ivoire, enter: Cote d’Ivoire.

sections.title: Are you intending to give the cash to someone else?
sections.shortName: Intending to give cash to someone

fields.label: Are you intending to give the cash to someone else?
fields.helpText: Select yes if you are just handing it over, and the cash is not in exchange for goods or services.
fields.errorMessage: Select whether you will give the cash to someone else

sections.title: Who will receive the cash?

fields.label: Who will receive the cash?
fields.helpText: If the cash will be split, select who will receive the largest amount.
fields.errorMessage: Select who will receive the cash

sections.title: Person receiving the cash
sections.description: We ask this to help counter money laundering, financing of terrorism, and other crimes. If the cash will be split, enter the person who will receive the largest amount.

sections.title: Business receiving the cash
sections.description: We ask this to help counter money laundering, financing of terrorism, and other crimes. If the cash will be split, enter the business which will receive the largest amount.

sections.title: What will the cash be used for?
sections.shortName: What cash will be used for

fields.label: What will the cash be used for?
fields.helpText: For example, buying a car, going on holiday or running a business. If you do not know, enter n/a.

sections.title: Declaration

fields.errorMessage: You must check the box to sign the declaration
choices: I declare that all the details entered are correct and complete to the best of my knowledge and belief.

fields.label: decInfo
fields.infoText:
You now need to submit your form, which will give you a reference number to show customs officers.

By submitting below, you confirm that you are carrying 10,000 euros or more into or out of the EU.

You need to make a copy of your submission reference. This confirms that you have made a declaration.

You should also print a copy of this form now, so you can show it to customs officers if they ask.
